name: Sirius: Age of the Free Agents
name_original: Sirius: Age of the Free Agents
description:
The Age of the Free Agents has dawned upon us!

Two hundered years after the colonial wars from Sirius Online, both factions have determined themselves to start exploring for newer, better options to colonize the universe. Earth and, in conclusion the Terran Forces have exploring the outer rims of the galactic arm, trying to find artifacts of other species to be used in the war efforts, with the Colonies seek contact towards the core of the galaxy.

Time upon time both have clashed upon each other, but only the invention of the Jumpgate-Technology made this recent expansion. Now you can be an independent pilot under the banner of of of these factions and seek out the treasures of the universe yourself!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Join a new Story-driven universe together with your Twitch Subscribers or play alone and uncover the secrets of the Crimson!
